description.value:
Lizardfolk*

Semiaquatic. You have a swimming speed of 30 feet, and you can hold your breath for up to 15 minutes. @Compendium[5e-stat-decoupled.abilities.4RXN46M6H6OEZNUH]{Semiaquatic}

Natural Armor. Your tough scales offer you some protection. While you aren't wearing armor, your AC is 13+Dex. @Compendium[5e-stat-decoupled.abilities.L6RMTHWQE8TOSQRJ]{Natural Armor}

Powerful Bite. Your bite counts as a natural weapon. It uses your Strength or Constitution and deals 1d6 + your modifier piercing damage on a hit. @Compendium[5e-stat-decoupled.abilities.4TXV49WCRM4160MW]{Powerful Bite}

Iron Stomach. You have advantage on saving throws against disease, and suffer no penalties for eating raw meat. @Compendium[5e-stat-decoupled.abilities.00YHEQAYQVFIUGQR]{Iron Stomach}
